title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives in the software, the CVS repository view loses its maximized state.
EB: The CVS repository view should maintain its maximized state even after switching perspectives.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the software and navigate to the CVS repository view. 
2. Maximize the view. 
3. Switch to a different perspective. 
4. Observe that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
